  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    AlterUtils
    Utility class providing various dialog and form helpers for JavaFX applications, such as confirmation alerts, info alerts, input forms for announcements, assignments, resources, courses, invitations, member/friend management, and submission viewing.
    FileUtils
    Utility class for various file-related operations such as extracting file names, extensions, handling dotfiles, modifying environment variable files, and determining application data storage paths across operating systems.
    FriendUtils
     
    HttpUtils
    Utility class for performing HTTP operations (GET, POST) using OkHttp.
    JsonUtils
    Utility class for performing JSON key replacement using Gson.
    ServerConfig
    This class contains the server configuration details.
    StringUtils
    Utility class for string-related helper methods.
    UserUtils
    Utility class for user-related operations, such as loading user data from a server-side representation or from persistent storage.
